com.facebook.buck.cxx

Class ByteBufferReplacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cxx.ByteBufferReplacer

  • public class ByteBufferReplacer
extends java.lang.Object
    Performs an in-place find-and-replace on ByteBuffer objects, where the replacements are of equal length to what they're replacing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteBufferReplacer(ImmutableMap<byte[],byte[]> replacements) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ByteBufferReplacer fromPaths(ImmutableMap<java.nio.file.Path,java.nio.file.Path> paths, char separator, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Build a replacer using the given map of paths to replacement paths, using charset to convert to underlying byte arrays.
      int replace(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer) 
      int replace(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer, int maxReplacements)
      Perform an in-place replacement pass over the given buffer (bounded by Buffer.position and Buffer.limit).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ByteBufferReplacer

        public ByteBufferReplacer(ImmutableMap<byte[],byte[]> replacements)

    • Method Detail

      • fromPaths

        public static ByteBufferReplacer fromPaths(ImmutableMap<java.nio.file.Path,java.nio.file.Path> paths,
                           char separator,
                           java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Build a replacer using the given map of paths to replacement paths, using charset to convert to underlying byte arrays. If the replacement paths are not long enough, use the given path separator to fill.

      • replace

        public int replace(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
          int maxReplacements)
        Perform an in-place replacement pass over the given buffer (bounded by Buffer.position and Buffer.limit).
        Parameters:
        buffer - the buffer on which to perform replacements.
        maxReplacements - the maximum number of replacements to perform (-1 means unlimited).
        Returns:
        the number of replacements that happened.

      • replace

        public int replace(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
